channel.title: Admin/Titles Problem
channel.description:
1) Ok, on the 562 server's which file do i edit to create admins? 2) When you first login the server you get a welcome message like on RuneScape it is "Welcome to runescape" Which folder/file is that in?
If you can help thank you very much.

item.title: Admin/Titles Problem
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Well I’m not much good with 562’s so I won’t be able to help you on your second question, although it’ll probably be in Player.java.

In regards to your first question, however, I can help you.

There should be a file somewhere called admins.dat or admin.dat

Just add your username in there.

Read full topic
